title: Charity and the Strange Smell of Money (1973) Western movie directed by Italo Alfaro

sources.title: Charity and the Strange Smell of Money (1973) Western movie directed by Italo Alfaro
sources.description:
Charity (Robert Malcolm) is in charge of delivering the railroad payroll, but some locals and a Mexican gang have their own plans for the money.

Original title: Sentivano uno strano, eccitante, pericoloso puzzo di dollari (1973)

This film is available with English & Spanish audio. And subtitled in many languages

Director: Italo Alfaro
Writer: Piero Regnoli

Main Actors:
Robert Malcolm - Butch 'Charity' Jenkins
Piero Vida - Bronco Kid
Rosalba Neri - Maria Costello
Luigi Montini - Al Costello
Salvatore Puntillo - Ramirez
Piero Scheggi (as Peter Landers) - Reverend Higgins 
Dante Maggio - Un vecchietto
Gianclaudio Jabes  (as Jean Claudio) - Pablo

Release date: May 4, 1973 - Country of origin Italy


0:00:00 Full Movie with subtitles
0:00:33 Wilson gambles recklessly, losing everything and falling into debt with dangerous men.
0:06:18 Father Higgins cleverly deceives bounty hunters to protect a fugitive hiding in the mountains.
0:17:04 Charity Jenkins reveals his mission to protect a million-dollar government shipment in Gila Bend.
0:34:38 Maria confronts Charity in a public bath, sparking tension and unexpected emotions.
0:50:57 Maria confesses her love for Charity, complicating her brother's criminal plans.
1:04:12 Charity and the sheriff prepare for a staged robbery, but chaos erupts as real bandits intervene.
1:17:55 Charity and Bronco Kid clash over the stolen money, leading to a dramatic showdown.
1:25:19 Charity and Maria reconcile as the town celebrates, ending with a surprising wedding.


@CultCinemaClassics
